*Stingtra closes the CR Chamber door which holds Quickstrike and sits next =
to it staring at it*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Talon Harvilic=
z 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 3:22 PM
  Subjec=
t: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Wildfire: 




  Wildfire transformed to robot mo=
de. She was a tall, black and silver bot. She had a silver mouth plate that=
 went from below her eyes to above her chin that went to a sharp point in t=
he center. She had red glowing eyes and a slim face. On her shoulders was h=
er horse head from her beast mode set in halves. She had black fur around h=
er torso and upper legs. 

  She knelt down to look at Quickstrike. He was =
an odd looking thing. 

  I don't like his eyes, she said. There's somethin=
g going on inside. She titled her head left and right, staring at him. His =
little face was motionless. His eyes kept staring down at the ground.  Wild=
fire jerked her head to KitKat. Show me what happened. You can replay what =
you saw in that cave. Do that for me. I may be able to show you what's happ=
ened to him. Just image it in your mind. I will catch it.


  >From: logomo=
rph@... 
  >Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  >To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
  >Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars 
  >Date: Fri, 28 Jul 2000 18:23:56 -0000 =

  > 
  >::KitKat:: 
  > 
  >"We came from a cave in the forest. Quckstrike=
 and Stringtra were 
  >there. Rowdy and I found Stringtra being held out o=
f a pond in the 
  >cave, by a strange, long and skinny tentical like arm. =
It let her go 
  >and we started snooping around. Terrorsaur and Drillbit d=
ug and 
  >found a cha! mber inside the cave. A strange wolf like bot was 
=
  >standing there." She looked at the CR chamber. Maybe that's what it 
  >=
is. You see, the creature had Quickstrike held down by wires, cords 
  >and=
 such. But I have no idea what happened to him before we got 
  >there." Sh=
e whimpered, "I just hope he turns out OK." She layed down 
  >on the floor=
 and licked her paw. She would wait to use the CR after 
  >Quickstrike was=
 out. 
  >
